Get the Node Table from a ComplexMap Object

Source: R/complexmap_S3.R
getNodeTable.Rd

A simple accessor function to extract the tibble of node attributes and layout data from a `ComplexMap` object.

Usage

getNodeTable(cm)

Arguments

cm

A `ComplexMap` object, typically the output of `createComplexMap()`.

Value

A `tibble` containing the node data.

Examples

# Assuming 'myComplexMap' is a valid ComplexMap object
# nodeData <- getNodeTable(myComplexMap)

On this page
